Plot.
Wayne Dobie is a good police photographer but not very confident with his 
other duties. Even so he manages to get local racketeer Frank Milo out of 
a hold up with his life, for which Milo wants to thank him. He does this 
by sending Glory round for a week, giving Dobie something of a problem. 
Milo seems to own people and he has a hold over Glory so that if she returns 
early it will go badly with her. And she's damned attractive too.
